revision.text:
{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = D-Link DNS-320L rev A1.jpg |image1_size = 100px |caption = ShareCenter® 2-Bay Network Storage Enclosure |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = http://sharecenter.dlink.com/products/DNS-320 |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = D-Link_DNS-320L_rev_A1 |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = Supported |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = D-Link |model = DNS-320 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = L |revision = A1 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = May 6, 2015 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/D-Link_DNS-320L_rev_A1 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = NAS |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Marvell;88F6702; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = ARMv5 |cpu1_type_rev = (Kirkwood) |cpu1spd = 1.0 GHz <!-- doc? --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = NAND |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = SK hynix;H27U1G8F2BTR; |flash1size = 128 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 256 |ram1chip = Nanya;NT5TU128M8GE-AC; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Marvell;88E1318R; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 70:62:B8, 6C:72:20,
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;1.1.4;Marvell 3.6.0. DNS-320L.01; |stockos = Linux;;2.6.31.8;
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, SATA |exp_usb_num = 1 |exp_sata_num = 2 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 3 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 4-pin header,, (115200 8N1) |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = RTC w/ battery, fan |addchip = System Supervisor MCU;Weltrend;WT69P3;;1;,,, 3A, 23V, 340kHz Synchronous Step-Down Converter;Richtek;RT8293A;;2;,,, 2A, 23V, 340kHz Synchronous Step-Down Converter;Richtek;RT8292A;;2;,,, N-Ch and P-Ch Fast Switching MOSFET;UBIQ Semi;QM3301S;;1;,,, |802dot11_protocols = none
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |is_manuf = Yes |tpfirmware = Arch Linux (Arm), Debian, Alt-F,
|availability = Discontinued |eoldate = 2020 |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 10/2012 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = 790069375743 |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B008HNRD4I |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}}
